resources.string: [ {\"n\": \"Ramsho (Vespers)\", \"d\": \"@ 6 PM\", \"id\": \"Ramsho\"}, {\"n\": \"Soutoro (Compline)\", \"d\": \"@ 9 PM\", \"id\": \"Soutoro\"}, {\"n\": \"Lilio (Nocturns)\", \"d\": \"@ 12 AM\", \"id\": \"Lilio\"}, {\"n\": \"Sapro (Matins)\", \"d\": \"@ 6 AM\", \"id\": \"Sapro\"}, {\"n\": \"Thloth Sho\'in (Third Hour)\", \"d\": \"@ 9 AM\", \"id\": \"Thloth\"}, {\"n\": \"Phalgeh D\'yaumo (Sixth Hour)\", \"d\": \"@ 12 PM\", \"id\": \"Phalgeh\"}, {\"n\": \"Thsha\'s Sho\'in (Ninth Hour)\", \"d\": \"@ 3 PM\", \"id\": \"Thsha\"} ]
